General.Name: Snovio
General.Description: Snovio is a decentralized lead generation service based on the principles of crowdsourcing. Snovio aims to solve the issue of low-quality and outdated leads on the market while also providing data suppliers with a guarantee of fair distribution of revenue from data sales. The SNOV token is an Ethereum-based token that acts as an incentive to contributors who update and add data.

ICO.Description:
Snovio is a decentralized lead generation service based on the principles of crowdsourcing. Snovio aims to solve the issue of low-quality and outdated leads on the market while also providing data suppliers with a guarantee of fair distribution of revenue from data sales. The SNOV token is an Ethereum-based token that acts as an incentive to contributors who update and add data.

Team:

  • Alexis Kratko: CEO & Founder 
  • Alexander Zhadko: PM, Web Developer 
  • Rodion Yaremenko: CTO, Web Developer  
  • Yuri Arendar: PHP Developer  
  • Dmitriy Shevchenko: Web Developer  

The Snov ICO will start on the 31st of October, 2017 and will last until the 30th of November 2017. The ICO allocation represents 60% of the total 2.5b token supply and will be sold for a $0.01 starting price.  The ICO funding cap is $15M and the funding goal is $5M. 

Token Reserve Split (40%):

  • 28% - team
  • 10% - contributors’ reward
  • 1% - advisory board
  • 1% -bounty

The Snovio ICO will feature a bonus and bounty campaign as well as an escrow agent.

Bonus Structure:

  • • $5,000–$50,000 + 15% SNOV
  • • $50,000 and above + 25% SNOV
